title: Vince's Life The Next Chapter: Getting Over Andrea
description: After Andrea leaves for the US, Vince lands his first job in an award-winning ad agency. Nursing a broken heart, Vince doesn’t think he can meet anyone who can compare to his first love. Then he meets sexy, fun, and vibrant Cat and life is wonderful again. Till Andrea says she’s coming home…
author: Vince O. Teves
